is.ru.ttt

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • is.ru.ttt.Table

  • public class Table
extends java.lang.Object
    The Table class maintains the game-board.

    • Method Detail

      • getTable

        public char getTable(int i)
        the getTable function takes in the location of the cell you want to get returned.
        Parameters:
        i - The location we want to find in the array.
        Returns:
        returns one cell from the array.

      • getFullTable

        public char[] getFullTable()
        The getFullTable function returns the whole table array.
        Returns:
        returns the whole arrray.

      • setX

        public void setX(char input,
        int location)
          throws IllegalPlayerOptionException,
                 AlreadyOccupiedException,
                 OutOfBoundsException
        The setX function takes in an input and a location. The function then inserts the input in a specified location in the table.
        Parameters:
        input - Input specifies the type of input to insert in the table, the input can be either X, O or E.
        location - Location variable specifies where in the table we want to insert the input.
        Throws:
        IllegalPlayerOptionException - This exception is thrown if the input is not X or O.
        AlreadyOccupiedException - This exception is thrown if the input location is already occupied.
        OutOfBoundsException - This exception is thrown if the location integer is not within a certain range.

      • toJson

        public java.lang.String toJson()
        This toJson function is used to create a json string.
        Returns:
        json string.
